--- select_from_path.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES AS t TABLESAMPLE RESERVOIR (10 ROWS)
--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 11,
      Source: &ast.PathTableExpr{
        Path: &ast.Path{
          Idents: []*ast.Ident{
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 18,
              NameEnd: 36,
              Name: "INFORMATION_SCHEMA",
            },
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 37,
              NameEnd: 43,
              Name: "TABLES",
            },
          },
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As: 44,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 47,
            NameEnd: 48,
            Name: "t",
          },
        },
        Sample: &ast.TableSample{
          TableSample: 49,
          Method: "RESERVOIR",
          Size: &ast.TableSampleSize{
            Lparen: 71,
            Rparen: 79,
            Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 72,
              ValueEnd: 74,
              Base: 10,
              Value: "10",
            },
            Unit: "ROWS",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES AS t TABLESAMPLE RESERVOIR (10 ROWS)
